content: प्रवद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To say, speak, utter. {@--2@} To speak to, address; <ls>Bk. 7. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To name, call. {@--4@} To regard, consider. {@--5@} To converse or talk with. {@--6@} To proclaim, declare. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to speak. {@--2@} To play on (a musical instrument).
